reviews.review: super jeszcze skradli mi konto i odzyskałem konto
моча ебанная блять, без ебанного прайма будут ебать в рот и в уши
Amazing multiplayer fps that rewards skill and practice. Fun to play seriously with friends, and to just mess around too.

Well, to not recommend the most played game on steam, one the game of the decade with major tournaments and a so big community around it might seems cocky, but I don't really enjoy playing it.

And one on the main reason is a very simple one : the aiming system.

One can say that CS:GO has it's own identity with the aiming system but in fact this is a total nonsense. Since when aiming in the foot will allow you to do headshots with certain guns while others will properly shoot in the foot. A gun is supposed to shoot straight god dammit, not half a meter in the upper left corner of your screen. The fact that each weapon has it's very own properties make sense but this should be at least a little bit consistent with the reality considering spread, gravity, etc.
The game just give me the sensation that they wanted to do at the same time a realistic and an arcade system which results in this weird mixing.

The community is what it is. We cannot really criticize the community of big games anymore because they are all trashy. But anyway if you want to be good at this game you would have to tryhard in a way you never did before to assimilate all of the guns aiming pattern. You will also have to know all the spots in all the map to hope killing someone.

Clarification : i'm not saying all this stuff because I'm a cry baby or whatever. I in fact am regularly first in my games or in the top 3 at least.

About the other aspect of the game, the graphics are okay, the sounding is good especially for the spatialization system (you will always know where a footstep or a gun shot will come from), the different gameplays are classic but correctly done but those positive points do not save the game of the mark I'm about to give it.

3/10

O que mais gosto desse jogo é a leveza da sua jogabilidade.

Отличная соревновательная игра , если в ней нет читеров

This is the moment that you have been waiting for, you have been training for several years with special operations all for this mission. You and your team are here to purge a group of terrorist cells from this planet. Intelligence believes that they may have planted a bomb on the site so you must be at your absolute best. Chemicals race throughout your entire body and you begin to think of your family. Your mother, your father, your wife, your daughter. As you are day dreaming your helicopter is struck by a rocket propelled grenade. You are slammed into the walls of the vehicle as it smashes into the burning, coarse sand on the ground. You attempt to make a run to cover as you take enemy fire. All of the sudden you lose all control of your body, and you slump to the floor. With your last breaths you look up, to see what person has pushed this fate upon you. And there you see standing, him. "MLGxGAMER360" as he begins to no scope awp every last one of your teammates. You uninstall CS:GO. 8/10
